snippet.textDisplay: the long covid thingy, does the side effects listed in prescribed medication taken to suppress or medicate matches the conditions you have mentioned? can you please provide the medication taken for this purpose. However, any virus is not our best friend and not sponsoring me. On BCG, please recalibrate on effectiveness because you still have tuberculosis linger in your system...... my wife from next to me says,"Hey!, didn't he know that people have flu every times on and off?", it should not come as a surprise - influenza is the same.... one of the biggest concern I have is you are taking about unknown toward the end, which do not have data except fear....not sure you reading this or not.. but I would like you listen to Melinda Gates TEDX talk on how to make non-profit foundation to operate like coca-cola, hope you can see the formula.
